General.Name: LapWall Oyj
General.Description: LapWall Oyj manufactures and sells wooden elements for use in the construction of buildings in Europe. The company offers element systems, single-layer wall elements, multi-layer wall elements, facade elements, ceiling elements, roof element systems, and installation elements. Its products are used in terraced, semi-detached, and multi-story houses; and daycare centers, kindergartens, and schools, as well as business premises and industrial buildings. LapWall Oyj was founded in 2011 and is based in Pyhäntä, Finland.
